name: addcli

stmt.origin: mp2an(wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))

body.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc)
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc)
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc)
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)

comment: Closure law for addition. (Contributed by NM, 23-Nov-1994.)
